text: vah vahee to hai jisane saare aasamaan va zameen ko chhah: din mein paida kie phir arsh (ke banaane) par aamaada hua jo cheez zameen mein daakhil hotee hai aur jo usase nikalatee hai aur jo cheez aasamaan se naazil hotee hai aur jo usakee taraph chadhatee hai (sab) usako maaloom hai aur tum (chaahe) jahaan kaheen raho vah tumhaare saath hai aur jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho khuda use dekh raha hai
